text:
company  is very accommodating , we wanted a vehicle that can suit our need within 10-15 mins. they were able to do it and assign a driver to us.

driver sham was very nice too, he waited for us as we have some baby emergency (poop), he waited patiently with a smile.

AVOID THIS COMPANY AT ALL COST.
A very rude guy by the name of Razis.  Dont engage your loved ones or your clients with this company. Driver Razis told me i dont get to chose what car and dont tell him which car nice/not nice.   AVOID THEM AT ALL COST !!

One of the worst services ever. PLEASE DO NOT USE THEIR SERVICE. They were late and no updates. Keep saying the driver will arrive soon and last minute change another driver for us when it was a wee hours airport drop off. They were impolite and unprofessional. 0 star definitely.

The driver was very professional and friendly on the Malaysia trip. We were very impressed with the service. Maxi cab taxi always arrive on time or arrive some time ahead of time in my whole trip!!  Highly recommended
The driver notified me prior to arrival and kept me in touch with specific airport pickup instructions. The 13 seater van was clean and comfortable. Maxicab 13 seater Van in Singapore Very reliable
